entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Kugaaruk
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 02:10 AM MST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -40.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Kugaaruk Airport 02:00 AM MST Wednesday 01 February 2023
Temperature: -40.1°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.5 kPa rising
Humidity: 67 %
Wind Chill: -50
Dewpoint: -43.9°C
Wind: NE 8 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Wednesday: Mainly sunny. Temperature steady near minus 41.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Ice fog patches dissipating this morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 41. Wind chill minus 51 this morning and minus 57 this afternoon. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 03:00 AM MST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 44 with temperature rising to minus 37 by morning.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy overnight. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h this evening. Low minus 44 with temperature rising to minus 37 by morning. Wind chill minus 61 this evening and minus 54 overnight. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 03:00 AM MST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 33.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind southwest 20 km/h. High minus 33. Wind chill minus 54 in the morning and minus 47 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 03:00 AM MST Wednesday 01 February 2023
